import { useState } from "react" import { Button, Form } from "react-bootstrap" import "./Form.css" function FormSec() { const [collectData, setCollectData] = useState({ name: '', gmail: '', password: '', gender: '', comments: '', skills: [], }) const { name, gmail, password, comments, gender, skills } = collectData const changeHandler = (e) => { const updatedForm = { ...collectData } updatedForm[e.target.name] = e.target.value; setCollectData(updatedForm) } const changeSkillsHandler = (str) => { const formD = { ...collectData } if (formD.indexOf("str")) { console.log("sss"); }else{ formD.skills.push(str) } setCollectData(formD) } const submitForm = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log(collectData) } return (
User Name Email password Gender Skill changeSkillsHandler('Javascript')} /> changeSkillsHandler('React.js')} /> changeSkillsHandler('Typescript')} /> changeSkillsHandler('HTML')} /> Comments
) } export default FormSec
